related.meaning: melompat keluar, bergegas keluar, terbang keluar

lessons.japanese: トムがテレビをつけたとたんにヒューズがとんだ。
lessons.indonesian: No sooner had Tom turned on the TV than the fuse blew.

lessons.japanese: シャンパンの栓がぽんと音を立ててとんだ。
彼は非常に想像力にとんだ作家です。
lessons.indonesian: He is a very imaginative writer.

lessons.japanese: 爆発がとてもすさまじかったので、屋根が吹っとんだ。
lessons.indonesian: Such was the explosion that the roof was blown off.

lessons.indonesian: The explosion was so powerful that the roof was blown away.

lessons.japanese: 証人喚問はとんだ騒ぎになってしまいました。
